clinical_study.brief_title: interACTION: A Portable Joint Function Monitoring and Training System to Supplement Home Exercise Programs Following Anterior Cruciate Ligament Reconstruction
clinical_study.official_title: interACTION: A Portable Joint Function Monitoring and Training System to Supplement Home Exercise Programs Following Anterior Cruciate Ligament Reconstruction

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to ascertain if home-based therapy with monitoring via telemedicine can overcome many barriers to compliance and improve rehabilitation following ACL reconstruction. Patients undergoing ACL Reconstruction will be followed for 6 weeks during their outpatient physical therapy treatment. Subjects will undergo weekly physical therapy or weekly physical therapy paired with InterACTION.

primary_outcome.measure: Value evaluated by the ratio of patient outcomes to costs of rehabilitation
primary_outcome.description: Value will be evaluated by the ratio of patient outcomes to costs of rehabilitation

arm_group.description: After ACL Reconstruction, subjects will undergo physical therapy 1 time per week supplemented by home exercise program with InterACTION device.
